description:
• Meet your instructor for the course, Celebrity Makeup Artist and Best Selling Author of Passport To Beauty, Shalini Vadhera.  In this course you will learn all the secrets to applying your makeup or your clients makeup like a professional celebrity makeup artist on multiple skintones and ethnicities.  

        You will learn:

        1. How to create a flawless canvas
        2. How to work with color correctors and why 
        3. How to find the best color for your skin tone and solutions for multi-cultural beauty challenges 
        4. How to create a natural look 
        5. How to create a dramatic look
        6. How to create a sporty look
        7. How to create a glamorous look 
        8. How to apply blush based on face shape 
        9. How to contour and highlight like a professional
        10. How to take your look from day to night
        11. How to create different looks for different clients
        12. The benefits of primer
        13. Application tips and tricks

        For more info on Shalini or to connect with her:

        Official website: http://www.shalinisworld.com

        Twitter: @shalinisworld

        Facebook: shalinivadherapotts
title: MASTER THE ART OF MAKEUP ON GLOBAL SKIN TONES
